summary: A comprehensive look at the Bush Administration's conduct of the Iraq war and its occupation of the country.
cast: Campbell Scott|Gerald Burke|Ali Fadhil|Omar Fekeiki|Robert Hutchings|Paul Hughes|Marc Garlasco|George Tenet|James Bamford|Dick Cheney|Donald Rumsfeld|Paul Wolfowitz|Colin Powell|Samantha Power|Feisal Istrabadi|George Packer|Joost Hiltermann|Ahmad Chalabi|Lawrence DiRita|Barry Posen|Lawrence Wilkerson|Seth Moulton|David Yancey|Hugo Gonzalez|Chris Allbritton|Jay Garner|David McKiernan|James Fallows|Nir Rosen|Paul Eaton|Robert Perito|Paul Bremer|Walter Slocombe|Amatzia Baram|Yaroslav Trofimov|Ray Jennings|Linda Bilmas|Ann Gildroy|Sergio Vieira de Mello|Jamal Benomar|Mahmoud Othman|Paul Pillar|Zalmay Khalilzad|Robert Gates|Aida Ussayran|Matt Sherman|Ashton Carter
title: La guerra sin fin...
